TIPS.MSG: GunZ is an action game that you can play for free.
Press F11 key to start recording the game. To stop recording, press F11 key again.
Double click the recording file to see it on Windows.
The route of saving a recording file or screen shot is shown on the screen at the time of saving.
You can enjoy a Clan War with your clan mates on this server!
Press the F12 key to capture a screenshot in a game.
Type /Report on the game to report the details of the chatting. (Function to report the user with offensive users)
All the characters of the same purchase account can share the cash items.
Do you use a sharing device? Try the port forwarding function. You can experience an optimized network play.
Is GunZ running too slow? Use the optimization in the option.
"Play Now!" button searches for an empty room for you. You can conveniently participate in the game.
The administrator or developer team will never ask for your password.
You and your group of friends can come together to make a clan to represent your team.
The items bought at the item shop on the home page are deposited into the "Central Bank".
Bounty items cannot be shared with other characters through the Central Bank.
In the training mode, you cannot change the Win/Lose or Kill/Death values.
Use the chat command '/r' to send whispering response.
If you have a character which is level 21 or above, you cannot enter the Entry-level or Beginner Channel.
Any ID that may offend others can be restricted.
Anyone who offends others inside a game can be subject to punishment by the operating team.
Once you defend yourself against the close combat attack, you have the Massive Strike chance right away!
Press the Ctrl+Number while observing a game to have the number assigned to see the relevant player.
Press F1 key while the game is on to see the key description.
